pages.text: Long ago, the ancient climbers of the mountain towers crafted these incredible Paragliders to soar like eagles. $(br2)With them, you can glide effortlessly from great heights and explore the world from above.

To find a Paraglider, explore the towers in the mountains, where these relics have been preserved for daring adventurers like yourself. $(br2)Craft a Paraglider using leather and sticks, hold it in your hand, and jump from a high place to start gliding!

But beware: if you run out of stamina mid-flight, you'll plummet to your doom faster than a pig with wings. $(br2)Upgrade your Paraglider with different materials to increase durability and speed, and always keep an eye on that stamina bar!
